website_summaries.verdict: Stays in place on cats that are escape artists, but the lack of a breakaway clasp is a safety issue.
pros: Fits adult cats well, even large Maine Coons
Color doesn’t fade over time, owners note
cons: End of collar juts way out on smaller cats, getting in their way

customer_reviews.title: Not for Sensitive Kitties
customer_reviews.text: This was my cat Pippins very first collar. It worked very well for the first week, soon I started to notice the hair around his neck started to fall out. I took off his collar and he had huge rashes all over his neck.The collar was not overly tight but was very irritating and itchy. If you have a cat with sensitive skin I would NOT recommend this collar, we have now switched to a 100% cotton collar and the rashes are starting to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaE

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other collars but they did not work for my cat. The "safety collars" lasted about one day before they came off his neck. He is an indoor/outdoor cat. I suggest a collar like this Catit Nylon Adjustable Cat Collar if you have a cat that spends anytime outside. This collar has enough length that it should fit most cats. My cat got used to it very quickly. I did take the bell off and also put a slide on 3/8 in. name-tag.
customer_reviews.author: M. McHale

customer_reviews.title: Purr-fect for my cat, Houdini, who easily escapes other collars!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loses a break-away collar in seconds. When I found this one, to replace one that lasted a year, I was hesitant since I couldn't see it in person. This is PURR-FECT. It was easy to get on him without too much drama, which in itself was a shock. Easy to pull through the left over area, and the bell is perfect to hear him and to warn a nearby bird. The color is GORGEOUS, its price is right; we will order more!
customer_reviews.author: My Hummel OpinionTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Received item on time and in excellent condition. There's not much to say about this ...
customer_reviews.text: Received item on time and in excellent condition. There's not much to say about this cat collar other than what I like most is the color of it. It looks great on my black and white cat. The material of the collar is nice and light, it breathable so as not to create any heat on the cat's neck and make him uncomfortable when wearing it. I actually gave it five stars for the seller as I received this item just four days after it was shipped out.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna L.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT(^ν^)
customer_reviews.text: our cat is still 3-4 months old so her neck is little so i did a little ajustments
customer_reviews.author: joselle

customer_reviews.title: Lasted longer than the pop-off types.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent collar that actually stays on my cat! He has lost 3 collars becasue they all pop off. This one has lasted the longest so far. Had to trim the extra length. Otherwise, highly recommend this collar. Nice bell too!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Zveare

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep the kitten from tripping the family.
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable and well made. I can hear the kitten moving around the house which is very useful in knowing where he is. Can also hear him rush towards my legs as I'm walking so I know if he's trying to trip me or not. We take it off at night so it doesn't keep us up, but that's kind of a double edged sword. Now at night we can't hear him or see him so he can easily trip us as we go to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you love your cat
customer_reviews.text: This collar is pretty cheaply made, it's very obvious. It smelled burnt, and I assume that's from where the holes are obviously burned in. The fabric of it snags easily, and it looks a mess immediately. Also, this collar has no stretch to it, no little elastic section, and no quick-release. Great way to kill your cat if they ever get hung up on something.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Roszmann

customer_reviews.title: My best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this, my cat loves this, everyone loves it. I think anyone considering buying this should just get it. It’s so great for the price. It’s not annoying and bulky so it doesn’t bother my cat- which this is the first collar my cat has worn in 10 years.. I also love the bell, it’s small yet you can still hear it. So if my cat is coming down the hall or hiding somewhere, I can hear where she is. I also LOVE the color, it’s so cute. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Overall Happy
customer_reviews.text: We really love this color for our male kitty cat! Pros: Thus far very sturdy, he hasn't figured out how to weasel out of it The bell has lasted since we received it and still going strong Super fast shipping Cons: Only came in one color (which didn't bother us that much because we still ordered it) Our kitty is a 12 lb cat and we had trouble punching a new hole for it to fit around his neck.. so keep that in mind. He ended up having a huge portion of the collar hanging down to the side that we decided to trim and burn the edges to prevent fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kitten of 3-4 months! I followed what another customer did to make it a little tighter (since my kitten is so small) by using a rubber band to fold the collar over again. It still fits quite loose, but she doesn't try to take it off. When I first put the collar on her, I immediately afterwards distracted her with the laser pointer. I think the hardest part was the jingling of the bell whenever she walked, but after running around with it for a while, it became her new normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through several collars for my cat. The others I purchased my cat got irritated by and would scratch them, and they would end up a frayed mess. Not sure what was irritating about them, but I purchased this one because it's small and knit tighter & different material than previous. She's had it for many months now and no problems at all. Perfect fit for any size cat. I do love the additional bell on it.
customer_reviews.author: SarahC

customer_reviews.title: Product is okay
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is okay. Not the best quality and can be tricky to put on, only because your cat gets annoyed with your hands around her neck that long. This could be seller error, but I did take a star away because I ordered two in blue and I got (1) blue, (1) green (kind of turquoise).. not a big deal, but not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty color, but it seems too long
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty color, but it seems too long; my kitten is already 8 lbs and it still would have too much fabric left over. Also, I quickly realized that he gets in too much trouble to be trusted with a traditional buckle collar so I had to buy him a breakaway. It is really cute though and a good price, might be fine for older cats or a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Stawbell

customer_reviews.title: The collar is very sturdy, I added more holes using fire and nail ...
customer_reviews.text: The collar is very sturdy, I added more holes using fire and nail and cut the collar a bit to fit my kitten. My problem was that my cat joked multiple times and it was a hassle to save her from the pain she was in (unclipping, unlocking, and the kitty screaming). When I tightened it up it was way too tight on her neck so she won't get to it. But it also seemed it was choking her. In the end, I ended up getting a breakaway collar. I think for my special reason this didn't work, but as long as you're sure you cat won't get her mouth stuck in there - go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't kill your loving ones with this dangerous collar!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the both cute colors. This one was on Ki Ki first. Our poor Ki Ki had been forced to open her mouth so wide only after 3 days on her neck. Through the terrified 4 hours searching and worried for her everywhere, we finally cut this dangerous collar with her bloody salivas all over it to save her jaw! PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS POOR DESIGNED COLLAR!!! It has NO elastic band or breakaway clip!
customer_reviews.author: LCK

customer_reviews.title: The right size for 8 lb Maltese puppy
customer_reviews.text: Yes, my puppy was a giant when we got him. Poor baby was double the size of his age group. But at 8 lb, he still needs a small, lightweight collar. Because he's always following us closely, we needed a bell on him. This bell is tiny, and the sound is very tinny (thin, metallic sound); it needs to be replaced with a bigger bell, maybe a 3/4" one to make a larger sound. However, the 3/8" width of the collar is perfect and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Bit big for a cat collar
customer_reviews.text: Honestly unless you have a chunky thick cat...this collar will likely be too big for him/her. I still kept it just is loose on kitty. The color is very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Elva

customer_reviews.title: Bought the smallest size for my young adult cat and it's too big
customer_reviews.text: I guess it depends on your cat size but this did not really fit mine good. I liked the collar and what not but was just big and I got the smallest size?? She's a young adult and not necessarily considered unusually small so I don't know what to think. Also since I have the collar on the smallest hole the rest of it sticks out and looks bad... Kind of sad because I like the color and whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while now. My cat goes pretty much everywhere with me so it get a bit dirty from time to time. Simple throwing it in the washer with a load of laundry or even the dishwasher get it almost back to the original color 😻
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I got a new kitten and cut off some leaving 2 more notches. kitten is now big and it is still good. This and a name tag got him back home when someone "found" him. Not the breakaway type. didn't want one. Wanted one that would stay on. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Alan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable and it fits!
customer_reviews.text: They nylon adjustable cat collar feels sturdy yet soft. The bell is delicate and cute. It adjusted large enough to fit my 27 pound Maine Coon cat, so I was happy it actually fit. For the price, this is an amazing product. My cat, who has never worn a collar before, doesn't even seem to notice he has it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxterp

customer_reviews.title: Not the correct color as in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Love the collar BUT it’s more of a medium blue color and not a minty color.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: nice color ok collar and why the bell.
customer_reviews.text: a bit loose, but my cat does not hate it and remains calm as usual so 4 stars. I do not like the bell that rings, I just do not understand why we have to ask a cat to carry a ringing bell with it. But i like the color and this is the only one I found on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lapin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but.,.
customer_reviews.text: I took the bell of because it was annoying. However, the ID tag my cat wears hangs down and hits her food dish constantly. She has only had the collar a few months and I’ve noticed it’s already starting to fray from her scratching. It’s really cute on her, though and she has yet to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: The Halls

customer_reviews.title: It's a Collar
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove the bell because it automatically makes our cat a target for larger animals when she's out after dark. Other than that, this item is exactly as described. The color matches the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great collar
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several collars for my cat and this is the only one she hasn't destroyed. very good quality and I would definitely buy again, I just wish they had one in purple.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Good for bigger cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved to remove her past collars, and this is the only one that's stayed on and doesn't bother her. It is a bit cheaply made, and though she's an adult cat, I need to have it on the smallest hole to fit my cat properly, so it probably wouldn't work for kittens or cats smaller than 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: My cat wears it and that’s what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint is that it slips, so that the excess pops out of the loop. Other than that it works and is pretty durable despite some fraying.
customer_reviews.author: CorrieL

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby! I was worried about it fitting since my cat is currently way overweight (about 14/15 lbs when she probably should be 10-12) but it fits wonderfully. The bell might get annoying for some, but I prefer it since my girl runs around a lot and hides everywhere - I like to know where she is by the ringing. This collar probably wouldn't be best for leash-wearing cats, though, as it's pretty thin, but if you plan on walking your cat you should be buying a harness anyway. Overall a lovely collar at a great price, and in an adorable color.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality collar and the color is gorgeous! Luckily my cat has not gotten any allergic reactions to the collar (she’s been wearing it for 2 weeks now). She has also tried to scratch at the collar, but the collar is still in great condition - no snags at all. All in all a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: My cat was allergic to the material.
customer_reviews.text: This collar caused my cat to have a skin allergy. As a result he scratched at the collar so much it began to show wear and tear rather quickly. Great color though. Bizzare allergy for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collar for my indoor cats
customer_reviews.text: Great collar for my indoor cats! It buckles with a prong and holes so it stays put. I have large cats and the sizing is generous enough to buckle the collar and yet leave 2 fingers space so they can get out of it if necessary. Yet it stays on 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: but this one is perfect for him and has plenty of room yet is ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates collars as a general rule, but he doesn't seem to mind this one! Normal cat collars wouldn't fit his large and fluffy neck, but this one is perfect for him and has plenty of room yet is still tight enough that it does not fall off. I highly recommend this collar, especially if your cat has a larger neck circumference than most due to overall size and/or fluffiness!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my smaller cat
customer_reviews.text: Looks like photo and arrived faster than expected. The collar was pretty lose on my cat though, she's a little smaller than most cats but the the end of collar sticks out and looks awkward. There's no band to keep it in place. The Nylon is pretty stiff and not as comfortable as other collars I have gotten her in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty and nice width but it was actually too long
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and nice width but it was actually too long. I had to cut it so the end wouldn't be hanging in front of my cat's face. I have a 11lb cat that it fits on the second to last hole and a 9lb cat that it fits on the very last hole. Wish it would have more holes to go tighter. They are pretty average sized cats.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Bui

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome collar, but its not quite small enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome collar, but its not quite small enough for our kitten. very sturdy though, and the bell has a delightful little ring to it. I can't wait until our little kitty grown into it!
customer_reviews.author: anna Marshall

customer_reviews.title: No stretch, no give at all.
customer_reviews.text: This collar has no elastic in it. It does not stretch at all. Our cats must have expandable collars. I love buckle collars but this won't do because it does not stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Happyblonde04

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice color for the price and actually pretty nice regardless of the price. The belt like closer seems to work while and the fabric is good, a little stiff at first of course but my cat seems comfy in it although she hated the bell :-) so I took that off. The color is very pretty, I got the Aqua
customer_reviews.author: Catwell

customer_reviews.title: Great for small to large cats
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for these at an affordable price. Stores only sell the break away collars and those get let st easily. I’m very happy with my purchase although my cats have become experts at taking off collars, doesn’t matter how good they are!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful color and easy to put on your cats. I've purchased 3 of these for all of our cats. Not only is it durable, the price was reasonable. You can't find collars like this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Knutson

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I love that the bells are not too hard to take off. I used them for my stray cats outside and they are still intacted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great colors  too
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats, and they wear collars w/ tags,working out great!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: This collar DOES NOT HAVE a SAFE RELEASE !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: otherwise, it's pretty, durable and looks good on my boy!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Looks gtreat and stays on
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and stays on!! After losing three collars, we now know where are kitty is at all times. And gives a head's up to all the birds that a predator is after them!!
customer_reviews.author: cmc

customer_reviews.title: It will do
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. My full grown cat at only 8lbs fits it, but I will be making one more hole to make it tighter. I'll also be removing the bell. I like my other collar better because it's a pull away and fits better. The only reason I got this collar instead was because the plastic closure (on my other collar) was too big to slide on this name tag:Looks just like the picture, cute color.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Fotopoulos

customer_reviews.title: We've had this collar on our kitty for about two ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this collar on our kitty for about two months now, and we have no complaints. She hasn't been able to get it off and it's holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Kosack

customer_reviews.title: love!!
customer_reviews.text: Thus collar is adorable and priced very fairly! I love it so much I am going to order another for when out kitten gets bigger. Shipping was fast too a++
customer_reviews.author: CA. mom4

customer_reviews.title: The D ring is great for a tag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable collar with many options of sizing. MY little guy is 3 years old and we were crazy about the bell so we took it off. The D ring is great for a tag. Color is exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Good collar for cats
customer_reviews.text: Good product good value. Local store purchase morr money and was not durable I recommend you purchase this product
customer_reviews.author: Eva M.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Product is as pictured. It was just too big for my kitty. They understood
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Cute collars, excessive plastic packaging
customer_reviews.text: Cute collars. Excessive plastic packaging which I don’t like because plastic is evil, but the collars are fine and will work.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: ive bought this collar twice for my cat and it looks great. the first one got really dingy looking after a few years so i replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Too many times, I was trying to put it around my cat but he refused to wear it. So I gave up
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's a cat collar with a bell. It does what I need it to, which is let me know where my cat is in the house and hold her name tag.
customer_reviews.author: MaryRFoster

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and the color is sweet if you have a russian blue
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Good product and a great price! But i didn't want my cat to feel it too tight so i put it little loose and somehow my cat pulled it off and lost it lol Ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good, affordable collar
customer_reviews.text: I really like this collar. I bought it when my kitty was less than 6 monts old, and it was a little too big for her, but she would wear it as a necklace almost. Now it fits way better. The only thing I had to do was removing the bell, because it bothers both me and my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong color
customer_reviews.text: My kitten has a light pink version of this collar and it is pretty nice quality, however I ordered the light blue color and instead received a bright red one. Hoping to exchange it for what I actually ordered
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: very stiff😞
customer_reviews.text: sent me the wrong color but this red looks good, very stiff material, hated to put it on my kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia T. Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: This collar will stay put
customer_reviews.text: My cat is able to remove break-away collars, so I bought this product. I works well---stays put. I like the bell and the loop for attaching tags. It's large enough for a cat or small dog. For my cat, I trimmed off the excess and it didn't fray. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Braus

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a bell probably better took it off
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a bell probably better took it off. Sturdy material worth the money delivered to your house Bam.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Leovy

customer_reviews.title: I love this collar and my kitty cats love it too
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar and my kitty cats love it too. I don't know what they think of the bell but I haven't found any dead chipmunks in the house as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I put it on my 🐈 it looks really good on her
customer_reviews.text: This collar is worth it. When I put it on my 🐈 it looks really good on her. The only one thing I don't like about it is that the bell isn't very loud and hard to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Orndoff

customer_reviews.title: collar was too long for my cat and we had ...
customer_reviews.text: collar was too long for my cat and we had to cut the long end off and it was very stringy afterwards which didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: IK13

customer_reviews.title: Pretty blue for female cat
customer_reviews.text: Love the pretty blue color for my female kitten. She is about 6 months old and 5.5 lbs and the smallest setting is a tad loose but doesn't fit over her head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple months now and it's still in great quality. Even with the bell though he seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat's been wearing this collar for a couple months now and it's still in great quality. Even with the bell though he seems to be a ninja cat.
customer_reviews.author: Suuyang

customer_reviews.title: fit my big cat easily. The bell isn't very loud
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, fit my big cat easily. The bell isn't very loud, at just the perfect sound where it drives neither me or the kitty crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: This collar is good! It is still on my cat a few ...
customer_reviews.text: This collar is good! It is still on my cat a few months later. She normally wiggles out of her collar!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Cat collar fits fantastically and is very durable. This collar does NOT have a safety release, which is what I wanted for my indoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Fox

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better clasp.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my cat as long as I can get the thing to stand still long enough. Needs a better clasp.
customer_reviews.author: wesley cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Not for kittens
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar for an adult cat. I have a young kitten (6 months), and he Hundini-ed himself right out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap, quality collar.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the bell, cat doesn't mind it at all. Very cost efficient!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hope

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable collar. Little to big for my small cat. But she will grow into it. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut off a little bit and burn the end, just right fit.
customer_reviews.author: NadyaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it's so pretty and the color is perfect. It fits well on my kitten and will adjust as he grows...that is if I could get him to wear it without trying to chew the bell off.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: So i had to buy it again cuz my sneak of a cat managed to get the last one off. She looks fabulous in it tho
customer_reviews.author: Lilith....✌

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat is still wearing this collar. But it’s totally faded. And he’s an inside cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Minter

customer_reviews.title: The color is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Color of the product is much darker and vibrant in person. Otherwise great product
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: It is not stiff and hard like most cat collars
customer_reviews.text: Just as the photo. Exact color I was looking for. It is hard to tell by the photo but the collar itself is very soft fabric and bendable. It is not stiff and hard like most cat collars.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: lucky find!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little collar!! Strong but thin and comfortable, perfect for a 6 pound chihuahua! Beautiful light mint color. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mbo

customer_reviews.title: Color a bit off
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright.. not the exact color as described... but whatever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat has happily worn this collar for many months now. It still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: LAP

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: This collar is very long and my cat keeps eating the end. Super cute I just wish it was a little shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler Esen

customer_reviews.title: I thought the material would be annoying for her
customer_reviews.text: Cute, strong and doesn't bother my cat at all. I thought the material would be annoying for her, but she doesn't even realize it's there.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Holes too far apart
customer_reviews.text: Not a good fit for my cat. One was too tight the other was too loose. Probably better if you have a 15+ lb cat. Loved the color and the bell has a nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G

customer_reviews.title: I love this collar but I was advised by a vet ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar but I was advised by a vet that they aren't safe for my cats. I did a lot of research as to which were safe and which were not. Great quality collar, despite what the vet said.
customer_reviews.author: Long Islander

customer_reviews.title: cat does not complain about thecollar whcih is a first ...
customer_reviews.text: cat does not complain about thecollar whcih is a first for any of my cats, I do notlike the "brak away" ones as cats lose them.
customer_reviews.author: sheila mizrahi

customer_reviews.title: Misleading color
customer_reviews.text: The color in the picture is very misleading. The actual collar is a sky blue rather than the sea foam green in the picture. The collar works just fine. I just wish it was the right color.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay for crafty kittens
customer_reviews.text: My cat ripped it off almost immediately, even when I tightened it.. crafty little suckers! But I loved the color
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leclair

customer_reviews.title: It's ajustable and fits quite comfortably around her neck
customer_reviews.text: It looks cute on Chloe. It's ajustable and fits quite comfortably around her neck. Plus it let's me know where she is hiding😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Honeydew

customer_reviews.title: My baby looks so fancy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful collar. My cat does not mind it at all, and she's never worn a collar before, so it must be comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: It was cute for a while then...
customer_reviews.text: Showed dirt quickly and the metal parts left black marks on the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Woot! Non-Snap-Off Collar FTW!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed, a non-snap off collar. Our cat, Boris, who is way too smart and does not respect our rules or opinions on things, will now have his collar on at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Seaglass color
customer_reviews.text: The collar is still a little large for my kitten, but she'll be growing into it fast. Color is beautiful Seaglass color
customer_reviews.author: Bigmamma

customer_reviews.title: Fits my chunky cat just fine with a nice jingle-y bell to scare off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my chunky cat just fine with a nice jingle-y bell to scare off the squirrels when he gets too close (and wake the baby)
customer_reviews.author: Jessie M

customer_reviews.title: Simple, works
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple, it’s just a cat collar. I like that it’s not one of those breakaway ones.
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vey nice quality. She was a little hesitant at first but now she's use to it
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: I just got it, it is too big on my cat, so I cut out about 1 inch. My cat feels comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Adeline

customer_reviews.title: I wish there were more holes so I could adjust it better for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: This color is HUGE! I wish there were more holes so I could adjust it better for my kitty.
customer_reviews.author: RL93

customer_reviews.title: The cutest
customer_reviews.text: My cat hasn’t ruined it and looks so adorable with this collar, his gray fur really compliments with the minty blue and I’m in love !
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Catit Nylon Adjustable Cat Collar, Blue
product_meta.description: This adjustable cat collar comes with metal tongue buckle, bell and D-ring. Available in blue color. Packaged on backer card. To find the correct collar size for your cat, measure around your cat's neck then add 2-inch. Made of nylon material. Measures 8-13-inch length by 3/8-inch width. This product weighs 0.04-pound.
feature_bullets: Quality and performance driven products for your pet
Provide a better quality of living for your pet with Catit
